site.title: America's Mobility of the Future
site.description: Join the 3rd edition of the mobility fair of the future. Take the opportunity to connect with decision makers and explore the latest trends that are redefining the way we move.

home.titleITM: THE MOVILITY'S MOST IMPORTANT WEEK IS APPROACHING
home.leyend: Registration with cost from October 9th $300 MXN
home.student: Admission for students Friday from 3:00 pm
home.credential: You must present a company credential to have access to the fair.
home.slogan: The Fair of the <span>Mobility of the Future
home.description: Americas' mobility of the future is the showcase for the mobility of the future, with a comprehensive program of keynotes, panel discussions and project presentations, seeking to develop the intersection between the current form of mobility and the future of mobility; Industry 4.0. Learn about the latest advances in the electromobility industry, smart cities and mobility technology developments on the exhibition floor.
home.description1: Demonstration of technological advances and innovative products from key players who are laying the foundations for the development of the mobility of the future.
home.description2: Conferences and panel discussions that serve as a meeting point between industry, policy and users to attract and complement the value chain, as well as the public policies needed to move towards a more sustainable mobility.
home.why_participe1: Learn from international experts and decision makers.
home.why_participe2: Drives the transition and transformation of the mobility of the future in Mexico.
home.why_participe3: Access to the latest technologies for sustainable mobility.
home.why_participe4: Discover business opportunities and potential in smart mobility.
home.why_participe5: Explore what's new in sustainable infrastructure.
home.visitor_profile1: Manufacturers and assemblers of automobiles, trucks, buses, streetcars and motorcycles

home.category1_1: Efficient vehicles, hybrids, plug-in hybrids, electric, autonomous, hydrogen, solar.

home.description_exhibitor: Showcase your innovations, tools and technologies that are revolutionizing the future of mobility revolutionizing the future of mobility and close deals with a specialized network of professional of professional buyers and high-profile visitors.
home.more_info_2: Join the 3rd edition of the mobility fair of the future. Take the opportunity to connect with decision makers and explore the latest trends that are redefining the way we move.

about_amof.title: Future Mobility Exhibition
about_amof.description:
AMERICAS’ mobility of the future, Expo & Summit, addresses the main challenges facing the mobility industry.

We bring together the main decision makers, key players and solution developers who are laying the groundwork to strengthen the value chain, infrastructure and complement public policies that will allow us to successfully move towards a smarter, more efficient and sustainable mobility.
about_amof.title1: The future of mobility is here
about_amof.description1: Promoting current political, economic and social discussions on the mobility of the future.
about_amof.description3: comprehensive lectures, panel discussions and project presentations, accompanied by an exhibition and technology demonstration floor.

why_exhibit.title: Why exhibit?
why_exhibit.description1: in the central meeting point for mobility innovators, technology solution providers and decision makers.
why_exhibit.description2: contacts and drives the transition and transformation of mobility in Mexico.
why_exhibit.description3: your network of business and mobility contacts
why_exhibit.description4: your company to business leaders, politicians and the media.
why_exhibit.description5: and promotes mobility products with a high visual and face-to-face impact with innovative content channels.
why_exhibit.exhibitor_profile2: Battery manufacturers and suppliers, energy storage systems and electric vehicle charging infrastructures
why_exhibit.exhibitor_profile3: Companies of autonomous driving solutions and technology
why_exhibit.exhibitor_profile4: Manufacturers and suppliers of components and supplies
why_exhibit.exhibitor_profile5: OEM of commercial and passenger vehicles

footer.event_date:
November 11 – 13, 2025
Poliforum Léon
Léon, Guanajuato, México
Wednesday and Thursday: 11:00 – 19:00 hrs. Friday: 11:00 – 17:00 hrs.

program.title: Conferences
program.description: We are delighted to present an innovative program designed to enhance the personal and professional development of our participants. Our focus is on two key areas that we believe are fundamental to success in the modern world: the Transformation Area and the Leaders of Tomorrow Area.
program.subtitle_s: Get inspired by our amazing speakers.

thanks_page.title: Thank you for registering
thanks_page.description:
Your registration has been successfully completed. We will send you an email with your access to the event.

We look forward to seeing you at AMERICAS´ mobility of the future 2024.

hotels.title: Special Hotel Rates
hotels.description:
We are pleased to announce that we have secured preferential rates at quality hotels to make your experience even more comfortable and affordable.

Strategically located around the event venue, these hotels offer not only comfort, but also the opportunity to fully immerse yourself in the atmosphere of the event. We have negotiated special rates for our attendees, ensuring that your stay will be as unforgettable as the event itself.
